title: Facebook, Apple and Tesla Earnings in Focus
itunes:title: Facebook, Apple and Tesla Earnings in Focus
description:
Jon Erlichman, Anchor of BNN Bloomberg's The Open, discusses Facebook and Apple earnings. Ross Gerber, CEO at Geber Kawasaki Wealth Management and Bloomberg News Auto Reporter Ed Ludlow break down Tesla earnings.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
